mapper.select: /*동의한회원별 동의로그남김*/ SELECT user_terms_agreement_check_code as userTermsAgreementCheckCode ,user_id_code as userIdCode ,user_terms_kind as userTermsKind ,user_terms_agreement_details_code as userTermsAgreementDetailsCode ,user_agree_check as userAgreeCheck ,user_agree_date as userAgreeDate ,user_required_input as userRequiredInput FROM tb_u_all_terms_agreement_check

/*동의항목동의상세테이블*/ SELECT user_terms_agreement_details_code as userTermsAgreementDetailsCode ,user_terms_agreement_check_code as userTermsAgreementCheckCode ,user_agree_terms_kind as userAgreeTermsKind ,user_reg_id as userRegId ,user_reg_date as userRegDate ,user_aplct_year as userAplctYear ,user_aplct_start_day as userAplctStartDay ,user_aplct_end_day as userAplctEndDay ,user_use as userUse FROM tb_u_all_terms_agreement_details;
mapper.update: /*판매자 정보 입력시에 등급 3에서 2로 업데이트!!!*/ UPDATE tb_u_all_user AS u SET u.level_num_code = REPLACE(u.level_num_code,'3','2') ,u.user_update_date = CURDATE() WHERE u.user_id_code = #{userIdCode};
mapper.insert: /*로그인시에 구매자회원 경험치 누적!!!*/ INSERT INTO tb_l_level_buyer_standard_details ( level_up_buyer_standard_details_code ,level_up_buyer_standard_code ,level_up_standard_detail ,level_up_exp_accumulate ,level_up_exp_limit ,user_id_code ,level_up_buyer_standard_reg_date ) values ( date_format(NOW(), 'lubsdc_%y%m%d%H%i%s') ,'level_up_b1' ,'출석체크' ,5 ,1 ,#{userIdCode} ,CURDATE() );
mapper.select: /*로그인이력테이블가져오기*/ SELECT u.login_num ,u.login_date ,u.login_ip ,u.user_id_code ,user_OS ,user_Browser ,u.buyer_exp ,u.seller_exp FROM tb_u_user_log AS u
mapper.insert: /*판매적 학력이 없을때 작업 입력*/ INSERT into tb_u_expert_education ( expert_final_education_code ,user_id_code ,expert_school_name ,expert_major ,expert_final_state ,expert_academic_document ,expert_reg_date ,expert_update_date )values( date_format(NOW(),'ua%y%m%d%H%i%s') ,#{userIdCode} ,'#1' ,'#1' ,'#1' ,'#1' ,CURDATE() ,CURDATE() );

/*판매적 근무사항이 없을때 입력*/ INSERT into tb_u_expert_career ( expert_career_details_code ,user_id_code ,expert_company_name ,expert_work_department ,expert_position ,expert_work_place ,expert_work_date ,expert_etc ,expert_stay_use ,expert_career_proof_matters_attachments )values( date_format(NOW(),'uc%y%m%d%H%i%s') ,#{userIdCode} ,'#' ,'#' ,'#' ,'#' ,'#' ,'#' ,'#' ,'#' );
mapper.select: /*회원모두보여주기*/ SELECT user_id_code as userIdCode ,user_pw as userPw ,user_name as userName ,user_contact as userContact ,user_email as userEmail ,user_withdraw_status as userStatus ,user_activity_area as userArea ,user_retention_Points as userPoint ,user_rating_buyer ,user_rating_seller ,user_rating as userRating ,user_reg_date as userRreDate ,user_update_date as userUpDate ,level_num_code as userLevel from tb_u_all_user

/*판매가 비지니스 탑카테고리*/ SELECT g.goods_top_category_name as goodsTopCategoryName ,g.goods_top_category_code as goodsTopCategoryCode ,g.user_id_code as userIdocde ,g.goods_top_category_reg_date as goodsTopCategoryRegDate FROM tb_g_goods_top_category as g

select g.goods_sub_category_code ,g.goods_sub_category_name ,g.goods_sub_category_reg_date ,g.goods_top_category_code ,g.goods_top_category_name from tb_g_goods_sub_category as g where g.goods_top_category_code = #{topCategory};

/*로그인을 위한 정보조회*/ SELECT u.user_id_code ,u.user_pw ,u.user_name ,u.user_contact ,u.user_email ,u.user_activity_area ,u.user_retention_Points ,u.user_rating ,u.level_num_code FROM tb_u_all_user as u WHERE u.user_id_code = #{userId};
